author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE ERICK MOVING INLAND OVER SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...FLOODING RAINS CONTINUE...
summary: ...HURRICANE ERICK MOVING INLAND OVER SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...FLOODING RAINS CONTINUE... As of 12:00 PM CST Thu Jun 19 the center of Erick was located near 17.1, -99.0 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 988 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HURRICANE ERICK MOVING INLAND OVER SOUTHERN MEXICO... ...FLOODING RAINS CONTINUE... As of 12:00 PM CST Thu Jun 19 the center of Erick was located near 17.1, -99.0 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 988 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary for Hurricane Erick (EP5/EP052025)
